outcome_details: The Respondent was successful. M.M.B. was ordered to repay collected child support, pay base child support, and arrears of s. 7 expenses. M.M.B.'s financial circumstances considered but did not displace Respondent's entitlement to costs.
summary: In a long and tortuous family law case regarding child support and arrears, the court found in favor of the Respondent (C.M.V), ordering the Applicant (M.M.B) to repay child support she collected after children moved in with the Respondent, to pay base child support and arrears of s. 7 expenses. Despite M.M.B's claims of financial hardship, the court awarded costs to the Respondent due to his success at trial and the unreasonable behavior of both parties.
